author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Arista Networks Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $1.71
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Arista Networks Inc:
* ARISTA NETWORKS, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.71
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.29 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 42.7 PERCENT TO $467.9 MILLION * SEES Q1 REVENUE BETWEEN $450 AND $468 MILLION * SEES Q1 NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN BETWEEN 63% TO 65%
* SEES Q1 NON-GAAP OPERATING MARGIN OF APPROXIMATELY 32%
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.41, REVENUE VIEW $453.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $457.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
